pyzui.mainwindow module¶

PyZUI QMainWindow.

pyzui.mainwindow.PyZUI(*args, **kwargs)¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

class pyzui.mainwindow.MainWindow(framerate=10, zoom_sensitivity=50)[source]¶

Bases: QMainWindow

MainWindow windows are used for displaying the PyZUI interface. This class defines all’the interface affordances, menus, widgets, frames ecc. Framerate and zoom_sensitivity variables have to be declared the same value as in qzui class

Constructor: MainWindow()

Create a new MainWindow.
